Try to structure it in the most comfortable way for you: soon there will be a lot of important emails with tasks, information about new courses, or company news.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every day, more and more top specialists appear at MSTD, and with them - useful initiatives and news. How can you stay up to date on everything? If you see a crane in the header of the email, it's us, and we are hurrying to share news from our division.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
